Question & Options:
Which actresses were considered for the female lead in the movie 'Yaadein'?
Options:
A. Hrithik Roshan
B. Kareena Kapoor
C. Ameesha Patel
D. All of the above

Which actresses were considered for the female lead opposite Hrithik Roshan in the movie?
Options:
A. Ameesha Patel
B. Kareena Kapoor
C. Priyanka Chopra
D. Deepika Padukone

What can be inferred about the casting and performance of the movie involving Hrithik Roshan?
Options:
A. Ameesha Patel was initially considered for the female lead.
B. Hrithik Roshan starred in a movie that was a box office failure.
C. Kareena Kapoor was the female lead opposite Hrithik Roshan.
D. Ameesha Patel eventually starred in the movie.
Correct Answer: Ameesha Patel was initially considered for the female lead. Hrithik Roshan starred in a movie that was a box office failure.
